content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I will start with the price of 1000 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I am a student and I have a limited budget.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand, but this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I can go down to 950 Euro, but I cannot go any lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but 950 Euro is still too high for me as a student. Can you consider a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price of 950 Euro is already very reasonable considering the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I am really interested in the apartment and I am willing to pay 900 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think 900 Euro is too low for this apartment. I can offer 925 Euro instead.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer. However, I must insist on 900 Euro per month. I am a student and I have a limited budget.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [900] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
